title: trying to play league but computerless
body: So I have had a string of bad luck and no longer have a personal computer. I have tried to download the client on a flash drive, but none of the public access computers allow downloads (or are some google chrome OS, which wont download Mac or Windows version). I am looking for some tips/tricks or general opinions.

replies.body:
Running League off of a public computer is going to be *really tough*. The League Client requires administrative privileges, which is usually pretty hard to get on a public access PC. Additionally, League **may** be able to run on a flash drive, but you may run into some big patching issues at some point. 

I'd recommend reaching out to the system administrator of the public access PC's so they can assist you with a [**proper installation**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) of League. Let me know if you have any questions.
